head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MORRIS, WILLIAM HENRY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MORRIS, WILLIAM HENRY

block.p: MORRIS-William Henry. On May 16, 2000, beloved husband of Sherry, devoted father of Dr. Theresa E. Morris, Robert C. Morris, and William H. Morris, Jr. Reposing at Donohue Funeral Home, 293 Castle Avenue, Westbury, NY. Religious service Thursday 10:30 A.M. at The Brookville Reform Church, Brookville, NY. Interment Pinelawn Memorial Park. Visiting hours Wednesday 7-9 P.M.
